texts.es: Luisa Emilia de 40 años de edad, originaria de Chichigalpa, casada, con dos hijos menores  de edad a su cargo y ambos estudiantes de secundaria, es trabajadora activa del estado y recibe también el aporte del esposo que se dedica al comercio, ella  es una mujer luchadora que con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo ha podido salir adelante con su familia. Está solicitando se le brinde la oportunidad de un préstamo, para reparar y reconstruir todo el embaldosado en la parte de área de la cocina y patio de su vivienda, el cual  se encuentra bien deteriorado y necesita comprar materiales como: arena, piedrín, cemento, hierro liso y el pago del costo de la mano de obra, de antemano agradece el apoyo de los inversionistas por apoyo que les brindan a las personas de escasos recursos, para poder obtener un préstamo.
texts.en:
Luisa Emilia, 40, is from Chichigalpa.  She is married and has two minor children who attend secondary school.  She is an active state worker and also receives support from her husband who is a merchant.  With much sacrifice and determination, Luisa Emilia has been able to provide for her family.  She is requesting a loan to repair the tile in an area of the kitchen and also fix up the patio which is in disrepair.  The materials she needs to buy are sand, gravel, cement and iron, and she also must hire workers.

She is grateful to lenders for the support they give people with low incomes so they can obtain a loan.

loans.use: To fix up her kitchen and patio.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel de 56 años de edad vive junto a su compañera en casa propia; el posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, cafe, entre otros, tiene 7 años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, está ubicada en el lugar de su residencia en una localidad muy transitada, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda mas surtida, don manuel es un hombra muy trabajador, como todo buen comerciante  quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, huevos, pan, bebidas, etc. Manuel tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Manuel, 65, lives with his wife in their own house.  He runs a store and sells essential items such as beans, milk, eggs, bread, coffee, etc., and has been in business for seven years.  His vast sales experience has allowed him to improve his earnings.  The store is set up in his home which is located in a busy area, so he has many customers for his well-stocked business.

Manuel is a hard worker and, like all good salesmen, wants to increase business by making a new investment.  But he does not have the capital to do so and is requesting a loan to buy basic grains, sweets, eggs, bread, beverages, etc.  Manuel has a good credit record and is committed to paying back the loan.  He trusts this will give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, sweets, bread, eggs, instant products and beverages.

loans.name: Fotima

texts.ru: Фотима умная женщина. Она всегда старается, чтобы ее семья была счастлива и жила в достатке. Она как хранительница доброты и покоя семьи говорит, что «я буду создавать уют для своей семьи». Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Дети  не совершеннолетние и учатся в средней школе. Фотима окончила Медицинский Университет по специальности фармацевта. Она очень хороший медик и имеет хорошие знания. Дополнительно она обучилась в курсе бухгалтерского учета. Она несколько лет работала в организации фармацевтом. В прошлом году она изменила должность, то есть теперь она работает материальном бухгалтером в той же организации. Она уже несколько лет планирует отремонтировать свой дом, так как ее дом очень старый и имеет плохое состояние. Она планирует отремонтировать все комнаты. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки строительных материалов, как цемент, древесина, краски и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Fotima is an intelligent woman who always tries to ensure that her family lives happily and prosperously. As the guardian of her family's peace and stability, she says, "I am going to create comfort for my family." She is married with two children. Her children are still minors and go to high school. 

Fotima graduated from a medical university with a specialty in pharmacy. She is a very good, knowledgeable medic. She also has training in bookkeeping. She worked as a pharmacist for an organization for a few years. Then, last year she changed her position and began working as a financial accountant for the same organization. 

For a few years, Fotima has planned on renovating her home because her old home is in very bad condition. She plans to renovate all the rooms. She is requesting a 3,000-dollar loan to purchase construction materials such as cement, wood, paint, etc. She is waiting and hoping on your compassion!

loans.use: To purchase building materials such as cement, wood, paint for home renovations
